systemMaintenance.system-info-dialog-message: The services have been restarted. You will have to login again.
systemMaintenance.error-message-onclose: No response, please refresh the page.
systemMaintenance.confirm-message-node-stop: Are you sure, you want to stop the node?
systemMaintenance.confirm-message-node-start: Are you sure, you want to start the node?
systemMaintenance.confirm-message-node-shutdown: Are you sure, you want to shutdown the node?
systemMaintenance.confirm-message-shutdown-sub: Please note that if you shutdown the node then the entire application will stop
systemMaintenance.shutdown-note: Note: {node} is in shutdown state. You need to start it manually.

maintenance.downloadOrView: Download or view audit logs for the selected time period.
maintenance.allNodesOnlineNote: Note: Node replacement is only available when any one of the nodes is in shutdown state. In order to complete node replacement please shutdown the node from system maintenance page.
maintenance.updateSoftwareFile: Update the software. Upload the software bundle file (.iso) received from Seagate.
maintenance.updateSoftwareClick: Click Start update once the bundle file is uploaded successfully. After the software update, you must login again.
